      void deleteAccount(java.util.ArrayList<User> accounts, int userId)
      User can delete its account by entering its user id If the user enter wrong user id, user can not delete account This method implemented but is not in the menu

      void forgotPassword(java.util.ArrayList<User> accounts)
      When an existing user forgot password, it can change its password to sign in User must enter its email to change password If the entered email wrong, user can not change password
      int signIn(java.util.ArrayList<User> accounts)

      void signUp(java.util.ArrayList<User> accounts)
      User can sign up by entering its name, surname, email and password User must enter a unique email If there is another user with entered email, user can not sign up When user signed up, system assigned a user id to user automatically User id is also unique

        public void signUp(java.util.ArrayList<User> accounts)

        Returns:

      • forgotPassword
